description:
A basic sound recorder app for Android.
Sound Recorder Plus is a free and open source sound recorder for Android based on Sound Recorder. It has the following features:

* Easy recording. Just hit the record button, hit stop when finished, and you're done!
* Recording management. Manage your recordings straight in the app with no hassle.
* High quality recording. Record in high quality by default or fine-tune the bitrate and sample rate yourself.
* Persistent recordings. Recordings exist even after uninstall or clearing the app's storage.

Sound Recorder Plus also has the following improvements over its original counterpart:

* Support for modern versions of Android. Android 7.0 or later is required.
* High quality recording. This option is enabled by default.
* Improved RTL support. The app now fully adapts to languages with an RTL layout.
